name: Lit Bit Retro Mix
description:
Created at the 48(42) hour DigiFest 2017 game jam. The theme was "8-bit Renaissance"

Team: John Hawley(Code), Melisa Johnson(Code), Will Anderson(Art/SFX/Music), and Kerwin Popo(Art)

Received 1st place.

Move and shoot!

Controls: 

Move: Arrows/WASD/LeftStick  

Shoot: Space / A 

Press Start or Enter to start the game.

Source: https://github.com/jh318/GameJam2017
